cause.description:
L4L is a summer camp program located at Hamilton College in Clinton, NY, run by Teresa Huggins and Mark Roark. Leaders for Life is the best six days that you will ever experience. You will meet people that will become your family, and you will learn more about yourself in the process. From the challenging ropes course to heart-felt words of wisdom, Leaders for Life provides many unforgetable memories.
1. Teens can change the world
cause.mission: Provide life-enriching experiences to enhance self-motivated positive behavior in the people who will influence their communities.
cause.name: Leaders For Life
